name: Softblock magazines
author: shazbot
label: Softblock magazines
desc: Prevent a magazine from appearing on the main subscriptions index, but do not explicitly block its content altogether if visiting the magazine directly. Adds a softblock button next to magazine names on the thread index. Softblocked mags can be managed via the magazine subscriptions index or via a specific magazine's sidebar. Disabling this add-on will clear your softblocked magazines
